title: Who will you miss the most when he's gone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who will i miss when my x narsole is gone? Oh not him. When you do the work on yourself you work like a dog and evolve into a wonderful handsome, loving and yet cautious new man. The experience is there the highs and lows but it was all based on lies so i shelve it all to face forward and the sun , when you get your duckies in a row and you move up or forward my goal is not to relive the past but To live in the now

thanks for the A2A! Simply put, my Grandmother…who has already gone…no pain ever compares to that of the loss of losing someone so special…she was 85 when we lost her in June 2019. Dementia had taken her over, & radiation for a spot of cancer in hed spine. She was, still is in fact, the most wonderful, kind, caring, loving, special person in my life! I know I'm lucky as I turned 42 in December, and not many people my age still has their grandparents, so I've beem truly blessed…but by god do I miss her, so much so, not 1 single day goes by that I don't cry…it's honestly the worst pain ever…
